title: Windows firewall bug
body: Ever since last patch every so often after character select counts down and it goes to load the loading screen I get an error saying there "may" be a problem with my windows Firewall which are all completely turned off.. This bug has caused my account to go into the Low priority que from leaver buster. Why am i being punished for your faulty patch and game? Been playing for years and it has worked fine, been on this laptop for a year and never had this crash error until now after last patch.. If i can be removed off of the leaver buster id appreciate it, if not please fix this stupid bug.

replies.body:
I was leave-bustered as well just now. Was firewall gitched (its completely off) still won the aram match yet it made me sign the punishment. I have a solid no abandon record. Please fix this and restore my account to unpunished status. Game info found here. VV

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1666474479/202425731
So when this happens again you want to type out I agree again?  Whatever floats your goat brah. {{champion:16}}
same stupid lol buggy crap
I tried everything it's def a problem with them and not us, they had this bug before and it "magically" fixed itself.  It's a game breaking bug IMO....

I got a LeaverBuster warning even though I spent the entirety of the match TRYING to connect to it and repeatedly failing.  Nothing about my computer has changed since I played the day before yesterday, but I suddenly cannot connect to the game server.  WTF.
just started playing league and now i think its a horrible game because of all of these tech issues
I have this happening to me too.  This is frustrating.

Okey.... i got that sh1t too.... i tryed everything and no, i am not jockeing every ducking thing..... even looking at its core -.-___-.- But nothing... with firewalls off, cheching the server status and other things... i am from a laptop useing wifi. because there is no other way i can possibly play that thing... i tryed even playing in the collage and same error... i got no other options just uninstalling the game and just wate until now.... i got this error like 1 year ago and sence.... It hasn't even worked out.. dear Riot games... I got a little question: Why you not make this sh1t works good for people like us? or don't you even cares abaut things like that? Ohh i see maybe in my region or other regions too i tryed all of it. and i am serious i tryed all of its kind and nothing i chechked every link and others in this forum type thingy i am searched worthless a lots of days by finding any fix of it. Why Don't You Help Us? Or we are nothing you are want to care abaut? or we are just nothing just a group of ragers? and we are rageing for nothing just a little thing what you don't even care? NO. We are love this game so mutch you can't even expect thats why i still want to play that thing sence i was registrated to the game i am realy enjoyed the playstile and i still love it and i don't want to go to other crappy mobas! This is the only thing i love the lol. So let's make a good dam good deal. You fix the bug and we will play and make the game even popular like its wasn't popular today... because its #1 from all the mobas i know and its my only personal option.. still... I WANT THAT GAME TO PLAY! Please... make it to we can play it too :'(

I fixed this problem for my Oceania server by updating my ethernet drivers and using this: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/299357

But this solution still does not solve my NA account problem.

My OCEANIA WORKS BUT NA STILL DONT:(

same sh1t happened to me last night, its getting worse.and I'm tired and sick of keep trying to reconnect  the game  for like 40 times,can't reconnect until the game was finished. and mark me as a leaver.
Didn't work. Fuck you.

I've been having the same thing and now i'm literally stuck in a permanent lower priority queue that was supposed to be removed after 5 games. and its been way more than 5. yet I have to wait 10 minutes per game. which is outrageous. saying that it is your connection not ours. yet they post this "Network Operations  â€“ 2:07 PM  


Hey everyone, we're aware of an issue causing a firewall error message to appear after champion select. We're working on fixing the issue now."
I want my fuckin* queue removed. saying "it's your internet." no its your god damn shit client!!!!! fix it and remove my queue timer 

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/45005735

its been a total of 8 games since I played fiddlesticks where my punishment began..

Hey guys, 

We are aware of the Windows Firewall issue! You can check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gTWoNHAL-what-the-hell-is-this-firewall-error-after-champ-select-why-cant-i-connect-to-the-game) for more information!

I just had the same thing happen, Internet is totally fine I get to loading screen and it stays black and says the "firewall" BS when my firewall is off. I'm on a Mac and there is no other firewall or antivirus. They need to fix their stuff.

I never got to use that skin. i bought both {{champion:61}}  and {{champion:90}} . tried getting into custom game to try orianna skin, but i never got there :( got firewal error so could not get into a game. :(

i wish riot would just give me my money back and then i could waste it on some other game instead.

I'm also having this issue now, kinda fixed itself this morning, but it's back to it. As the client keeps telling me I'm disconnected from the PvP.net server, but I can play other games without flaw.
I really liked the new {{champion:90}} skin too :c

Emailed support regarding similar issue and got this response:
Me:

Dec 15 21:13

The rest of my internet appears stable however the league of legends client seems to get hung up when trying to access summoenr profiles or retrieve data regarding summoners. Additionally joining games I get massive delays sometimes timing out completely when going into champ select. Its making the game unplayable for me and I've tried everything on your support page to fix it. Including a repair and a reset of all hardware involved. Attached is the error message I get. If I do more than one action i.e Client profile, then leagues, it begins to spam me with that message. A similar thing happens when trying to enter a game.

Attachment(s)
client fuckign sucks.png

-----	

Ritos reply:

Blackfly (Riot Games Player Support)
Dec 16 05:38

Hello Tacpyoung,

Based on your description of the issue, this seems like a problem with your connection to our servers. While there are several potential causes, typically these connection issues are caused by overzealous firewalls or anti-virus programs. Even if you have no active firewalls that you know of, many firewalls are installed automatically with Windows, so you may have as many as 3 and not even know it.

Additionally, many Firewalls have processes that run in the background after disabling them, which still cause significant interference with our game.

We have a detailed guide to help you configure your Firewalls to work properly with League of Legends:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#jwq2

Unfortunately, even when properly configured, the disabled modes or exceptions lists often do not function properly for third-party firewalls. It would be much quicker to temporarily uninstall your firewalls from your computer. This would allow me to quickly rule them out as a potential cause of the problem so I can help you get back into the game faster.

If the problem persists or if I need to clarify something, please don't hesitate to contact me. When you do, providing me with this information will allow me to help get you back into the Fields of Justice as quickly as possible. (Make sure to provide this information even if you have already done so. We need to get information that is as up to date as possible):

1) A Process List: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq3

2) Network Analysis: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq1

3) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#jwq4

Blackfly
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games

i got this same answer. telling me that it is MY computer that is the problem. and it clearly is not only mine problem.
and i did turn off everything that would give me any kind of security when surfing in internet, and these days that is not very smart. and yet this is what riot is suggesting us to do.
Me too. They are about 20 mins in as I speak. I found a past board about this, so I'm just going to post my netlogs now, in case this helps.

I am now having the same issue as well. I now have an AFK on a prelim match all because Of the Firwall Bug. I to have a solid no leave record that is now spoiled by the damn thing. My firewall is off and LOL and its subfiles have all been allowed. why is this problem happening now? I would love it if my recored could be wiped clean, or at least evaluated for this. I dont want this kind of this on my record as I loath leaving games and would love to my ranked que with out any issues. Please tell me there is a way to fix this so there is no further issues.
This shit happens to me even though my firewall isn't even enabled.

I'm having a similar issue. started loading into a normal game and the screen went black. After about 2 minutes it said to check my firewall and retry. This did not work so I closed out league. I then tried to log back in and it would not let me for about 25 minutes. When i got back in I tried to load back into the game i was kicked out of and it was already over giving me a "leaver" on my record. After I logged off that day I have not been able to log back in. I put my account name and password in, and it just says logging in... then connection timeout/still says logging in. I've never had a problem before and I guarantee that it is not my internet. I tried the repair option and it did not do anything.

I just got 5 game low priority que-punishment cause of this firewall-bug. This really sucks :/ And Riot is doing nothing i suppose.
And now i am afraid to get into a game, cause I am afraid that i might get that bug again and get even more severe punishment.

My custom games work just fine. But that is how it went just before my punishment too: I did 2 custom games, both worked great, but when i went to pvp I got the firewall error. :(
same shit happens to me it's so frustrating  can't even enjoy a game, because people take advantage of you being afk. can't really blame them though....anyways just fix the damn thing

I feel it has something to do with a random DC a good amount of people got last night. Many managed to get back in but the NA Server ping has jumped about 30-400ms for many people, and it's stayed consistent for a while now. I almost welcome a maintainence window so they can figure out what's going on. 

Definately does not feel good for a game trying to get new players in because the tech issues with these 'Firewall' posts are becoming near Sticky worthy. {{champion:154}}
It happened to me too

Same thing has been happening to me.  I disable my firewall and now it is working.  Used laptop on one network and desktop on a completely different network, same thing was happening.  In the firewall settings I noticed that "League of Legends.exe" was not an excluded program, I added that it still didnt work.  Added a few other exe's from the RADS folder under projects, but it didnt work.  Right now I am just playing with my firewall down.  

If there is a specific exe that needs to be added to the firewall that would be helpful?  Anyone?
Fix your firewall bs., I'm tired of getting into a game 5+ minutes after it starts, I mean I know I'm so great at this game, that ppl need a five min. advantage but this is redic
The same exact thing happened to me too and I run League on a Mac.
Same happening to me... last game I FINALLY got logged back in 12 minutes after game started only to find 2 other people on my team had the same problem. Its happening to a lot of people.
